description: Comprehensive training dataset for component composition (q:import, q:slot, component calls)

import_patterns.simple_import: ✅ Fully covered (3 examples: basic, from_path, alias)

training_readiness.notes: Comprehensive coverage of component composition patterns with 13 positive examples showing progression from basic to advanced usage. Covers imports, props, slots, and complex nested composition. 7 negative examples teach proper error handling and validation.

negative: negative/invalid_syntax.json (7 examples) - Common errors and validation

usage_instructions.for_llm_training: Use positive examples for component composition code generation. Show LLM how to build from simple imports to complex nested structures. Negative examples teach validation rules and error messages.
usage_instructions.for_developers: Reference these examples when learning component composition. See progression from basic imports (simple_import) to complex dashboards (nested_components).
usage_instructions.for_testing: Each positive example represents a valid test case for the component composition system. Negative examples define expected error behaviors.

example_diversity.implementation_styles: Shows 2-4 different approaches per pattern type
example_diversity.use_cases: UI components, layouts, dashboards, content projection, multi-level composition
example_diversity.multiple_solutions: Same problem solved different ways (e.g., static vs databinding props, default vs named slots)

integration_with_other_features.state_management: Props flow from parent to child contexts
integration_with_other_features.databinding: Variables resolved in props and slot content
integration_with_other_features.conditionals: Components can be conditionally rendered with q:if
integration_with_other_features.loops: Components can be rendered in loops with q:loop
